snippet: DAVIS--Edward. The staff and Board of the Legal Action Center mourn the untimely death of Ed Davis, our longtime Board member and former Staff Attorney who lifted the hearts of everyone he met. Ed was a champion of justice, a passionate advocate for the Center and the people we serve, and the kindest, most humble person to walk the earth. We were honored to work with and be inspired by Ed and will miss him terribly. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DAVIS--Edward. The staff and Board of the Legal Action Center mourn the untimely death of Ed Davis, our longtime Board member and former Staff Attorney who lifted the hearts of everyone he met.
